descriptor.name: Pebble Zest Active
descriptor.short_desc:
Product Information
Model Name : Zest Active
Generic Name : Wired headphone
Headphone Type : In the Ear
Inline Remote : Yes
Connectivity : Wired
Headphone Design : Canal phone
Compatible Devices : Mobile
Sweat Proof : Yes
Foldable/Collapsible : Yes
Deep Bass : Yes
Water Resistant : Yes
Connector Size : 3.5 mm
Deep Bass : Yes
Microphone : Yes
Weight : 65g
Dimension : 20*180*75
Country of Origin :China
Imported & Marketed By: SRK Powertech Pvt. Ltd. G-201, Sec-63, Noida, UP- 201305

Sales Package
Net Quantity:1
Inside the Box: 1N Wired Earphone, 1N Warranty Card
CUSTOMER CARE & WARRANTY
Policy: It comes with 6 months of Replacement Guarantee. To claim the Warranty, kindly register the product on pebblecart.com within 10 days of your purchase.
Covered in Warranty: Manufacturing Defects
Not Covered in Warranty: Physical Damage
Domestic Warranty: 6 Months Replacement Guarantee
Customer Care: support@pebblecart.com/+91 8800271651 for all technical support.
descriptor.long_desc:
True HD Sound : 10 mm Earphone Drivers provide Crystal clear, Top audio performance with driving bass, Crystal Clear Vocals and precision treble response for music you can feel
Super Bass & Strong Treble : Deep, rich sound across a wide frequency range, enhanced by a sealed acoustic design for better immersion in your music
Sweat-proof & Durable : Designed to be out and about, 3.5mm angled stereo connector design provides extra durability.
Comfortable Snug Fit : Ergonomic design provides comfortable Snug fit, keeps the ear buds steady in your ears without falling out. Don’t hurt ears even after long wearing
In-Built Microphone & In-line Volume Control for hands-free talking & volume adjustment, With L Shape connector for ease of using

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: SRK Powertech Pvt. Ltd. G-201, Sec-63, Noida, UP- 201305

descriptor.long_desc: The Helea Smart LED Strips in a 10-meter length are a dynamic lighting solution to illuminate your space in vibrant colors. Transform and elevate your ambiance with the Helea Smart LED Strips, providing a stunning visual experience across a larger area.

descriptor.name: Pebble Frost Pro Jet black
descriptor.short_desc:
Product Information
Model Number :	PFB47 Frost Pro
Generic Product Name : Smartwatch
Screen Size :	4.98 cm( 1.96")
Type :	Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch 
Dial Shape :	Rectangle
Strap Material :	Silicone 
Strap Size : 44 mm ( 4.4 cm)
Display Type :	Infinite Display 
Charging :	Magnetic Charging 
Battery Capacity :	230 (mAh)
Bluetooth Version :	5
Battery Average Life : Up to 5 Days Battery without BT Calling, Up to 30 hours Battery with BT Calling
Water Resistance : IP67
Dial Material : 	Metal Alloy 
Health :	Heart Rate Monitoring, Sleep Monitoring, SPO2 Monitoring
Notification :	Calls, SMS, WhatsApp and Social Media 
Sports Mode :	Multiple Sports Mode
Voice Assistance: 	Yes 
Compatible OS :	Android & IOS 
Watch Faces :	Multiple Watch Faces 
Other Features :	AI Voice Assistant, Smart Calculator, Alarm & Notification
Dimension : 10x5.8x10 cm
Weight: 175g
Country of Origin : 	China 
Imported & Marketed By: 	SRK Powertech Pvt. Ltd. G-201, Sec-63, Noida, UP- 201305
Sales Package
Net Quantity : 1
Inside the Box: 1N Smartwatch, 1N Magnetic Charger, 1N Warranty Card, 1N User Manual"
Customer Care & Warranty
"Policy: It comes with 12 months of Replacement Guarantee. To claim the Warranty, kindly register the product on pebblecart.com within 10 days of your purchase.
Covered in Warranty: Manufacturing Defects
Not Covered in Warranty: Physical Damage, Water Damage
Domestic Warranty: 1-Year Replacement Guarantee

Customer Care: support@pebblecart.com/+91 8800271651 for all technical support."
descriptor.long_desc:
Infinite Display: 1.96" Infinite display | Experience brilliance on your wrist with an almost bezel-less full touch curved screen
Bluetooth Calling: Answer and make calls with Bluetooth directly from your watch. Call, Message & Social Media Notification, AI Voice Assistant (Google & Siri)
Blood Oxygen Level: The Pebble Frost Pro comes with a blood oxygen level sensor that can help you monitor your oxygen saturation level and provide insights into your overall health and well-being.
Heart Rate Monitoring: The watch also has a heart rate monitor that can help you track your heart rate and provide alerts if it detects any abnormalities.
Multi-Sports Mode: The Pebble Frost Pro supports multiple sports modes, including running, cycling, swimming, and more. This allows you to track your workouts and get insights into your performance.


Multiple Color Options: The different color options in Pebble Frost Pro allows you to express your style and personality in a fun and unique way, making your smartwatch truly yours.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: SRK Powertech Pvt. Ltd. G-201, Sec-63, Noida, UP- 201305

descriptor.long_desc: Get your hands on a Pebble Frost smartwatch to manage your everyday activities and enhance your levels of fitness with ease. The Pebble Frost smartwatch has a 4.74 cm (1.87) narrow bezel IPS full touch screen curved display that accentuates your style and fits well on your wrist. The rotating crown on this smartwatch also makes it easy to move among the applications and offers you quick access to everything you require. Additionally, you can effortlessly view recent contacts and make calls using this smartwatch's potent Bluetooth calling feature with the help of the excellent dial screen included inside the device. Moreover, this watch offers a variety of sports modes that can be used to plan out your training routine and keep track of all your physical activities.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: SRK Powertech Pvt. Ltd. G-201, Sec-63, Noida, UP- 201305

With its compact design, it easily fits into any standard wall socket, instantly transforming your appliances into smart devices. Effortlessly manage and schedule your electronics remotely using a smart app, enhancing convenience and energy efficiency. Experience the future of home automation with the Helea 10A Compact Smart Plug, bringing intelligence and control to your fingertips.
